scriptComments: This script determines which Scratch player is being used and informs user of compatibility issues.

scripts: Please run Space Invaders in the Flash Player. It does not perform well in the Java Player.

info.comment: *** Works best in the Flash player or in presentation mode ***Press 1 during the introduction to start the game.Space to shootLeft/right arrow keys to moveI tried to emulate many of the details of the original Space Invaders with a few exceptions.  I hope you enjoy it.Feel free to improve it.
info.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/47.0.2526.111 Safari/537.36
info.author: ifugu
